remarks: A permutation of a finite set has exactly one parity.  (Contributed by AV, 13-Jan-2019.)
statement:
psgnfitr.g $e |- G = ( SymGrp ` N ) $.
psgnfitr.p $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
psgnfitr.t $e |- T = ran ( pmTrsp ` N ) $.
psgnfieu $p |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ Q e. B ) -> E! s E. w e. Word T ( Q = ( G gsum w ) /\ s = ( -u 1 ^ ( # ` w ) ) ) ) $.
$d G s w $.
$d N s w $.
$d Q s w $.
$d T s w $.
